joinTerms.title: Join Terms & Conditions
joinTerms.subtitle: Please read the following terms carefully before registering as a seller or driver on JordanMarket.

general.title: General Terms
general.item1: JordanMarket is a local marketplace platform operating exclusively within the Hashemite Kingdom of Jordan.
general.item2: All users must be at least 18 years of age and legally capable of entering into binding agreements.
general.item3: By registering, you agree to comply with all applicable Jordanian laws and regulations.
general.item4: JordanMarket reserves the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms.
general.item5: All transactions are conducted in Jordanian Dinar (JOD) with Cash on Delivery as the primary payment method.

seller.title: Seller Join Conditions
seller.req1: Full legal name and valid contact information
seller.req2: Business name and business address in Jordan
seller.req3: Valid phone number for customer communication
seller.req4: Clear product descriptions and accurate pricing
seller.reviewDesc: All seller applications are reviewed by our team within 1-3 business days. You will receive a notification once your application is approved or if additional information is required.
seller.reject2: Products that violate our marketplace policies
seller.reject4: Previous account violations or fraudulent activity

driver.title: Driver Join Conditions
driver.req2: Proof of vehicle ownership or authorized use
driver.req3: Clean driving record with no major violations
driver.req4: Valid phone number for delivery coordination
driver.reviewDesc: Driver applications are reviewed within 2-5 business days. Background verification may be conducted. You will be notified of the outcome via your registered contact information.

legal.title: Legal & Operational Notes
legal.item1: Sellers are responsible for the quality and accuracy of their product listings and are liable for any disputes arising from misrepresentation.
legal.item2: Drivers are responsible for the safe and timely delivery of orders and must handle all cash collections with integrity.
legal.item3: JordanMarket acts as an intermediary platform and is not liable for disputes between buyers, sellers, or drivers.
legal.item4: These terms may be updated periodically. Continued use of the platform constitutes acceptance of any modifications.

cta.title: Ready to Join JordanMarket?
cta.subtitle: Create your account today and start selling or delivering across Jordan.
